text: Altenburg is a city in the German state of Thuringia. It is the capital of the district Altenburger Land. As of 2018, 32,074 people lived there. == Twin towns == Altenburg is twinned with: * Offenburg, Germany * Olten, Switzerland * Zl√≠n, Czech Republic * Hickory, North Carolina, United States == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in Thuringia
title: Altenburg
